home.title: Meet your Website Co-Pilot
home.description: AI-driven Website Optimization for every website
home.details: We empower website owners and developers with AI-driven tools for real-time optimization, performance testing, and ongoing compliance with evolving SEO and accessibility standards. Packed with the latest technologies for the best website performance and highest possible rankings.
home.intro_left: Instantly analyze and optimize any website. SEO, performance, security, accessability, and legal compliance included.
home.intro_right: Actionable insights. Instant optimization. Keep every website at peak performance. Get started for free!

ux.headline1: Make your website accessible and legally compliant in 10 minutes
ux.subheadline: Free BFSG/WCAG Audit for all Websites
ux.level_mandatory_desc: Beheben Sie kritische Barrierefreiheitsprobleme gemäß BFSG/WCAG.
ux.level_thorough_desc: Verbessern Sie umfassend die Zugänglichkeit für alle Nutzer.
ux.fixing_in_progress: Die Reparatur läuft, bitte warten Sie einen Moment…
ux.meta_description: Führen Sie eine umfassende Barrierefreiheitsprüfung Ihrer Website durch.

pricing.subheadline: Meet your new AI website co-pilot.So you can focus on clients, not code.

dashboard.welcome_text: Here you can manage your websites, analytics, and optimizations. Add your website first or start an analysis directly.
dashboard.feature_1_desc: Behalten Sie alle Ihre Projekte im Überblick. Laden Sie Analysen, Fix-Berichte und Fortschritte für jede Website.
dashboard.feature_2_desc: Nutzen Sie die KI-gestützte Reparatur und Optimierung mit nur einem Klick.
